name: atsen-fullstack
description: ATSEN - A full-stack educational platform with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: cp -r frontend/dist backend/public || xcopy frontend\dist backend\public /E /I
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.digitalocean-build: npm run install:all && npm run build

author: ATSEN Team
